roleset.name: explore again
roleset.note: REEXPLORE-V NOTES: Based on temprel data. Comparison to explore.01 and exploration.01. No Vn class. Framed by Katie. (from reexplore.01-v)
REEXPLORATION-N NOTES: Based on temprel and stratified data. Comparison to exploration.01-n. No VN or FN classes. Fits with VN class investigate-35.4. Framed by Katie. (from reexploration.01-n)
